title: Data Set Changed
description: Notification that a data set has changed

dataTypeId.description: The id of the data type that has changed

setId.description: The id of the data set that has changed

description.description: The description of the data set

schema.description: The schema of the data set

protocol.description: The protocol of the schema of the data set

status.description: The status of the data set

additions.description: The ids of the records added to the data set

updates.description: The ids of the records updated in the data set
